extendedInfo.description: Application for calculating deposits, loan repayments, effective interest rate of loan.With this loan calculator you can calculate two types of loan payments â Standart(Annuity) and Differential payment. Moreover you can see payment table on differential payment.Distinctive feature of this loan calculator is ability to calculate the effective interest rate. The effective interest rate - a rate that takes into account not only the interest on the loan, but also hidden commissions used by the Bank. Youâll be able to see what is the real value of  0% credit, so widely advertised by banks.With the help of deposit calculator, you can calculate the interest on deposits and yield on the basis of 3 standard Compound interest options: - No capitalization;- Capitalization of a once a month;- Capitalization of a once a year.
